title: Exception thrown when exporting data in a table within a grid cell
OB: When attempting to export data in a table within a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: No exception should be thrown when exporting data in a table within a grid cell. The data export process should complete successfully.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Insert a grid. 2. Perform an action to export data in a table within a grid cell.
